Description.Title: VernalizationProgress model
Description.Abstract: Calculate progress (VernaProg) towards vernalization, but there is no vernalization below minTvern and above maxTvern . The maximum value of VernaProg is 1. Progress towards full vernalization is a linear function of shoot temperature (soil temperature until leaf # reach MaxLeafSoil and then canopy temperature)

Input.description: list containing for each stage occured its cumulated thermal times
Input.name: calendarCumuls_t1

Input.description: minimum final leaf number
Input.name: minFinalNumber_t1

Input.description: List containing appearance of each stage
Input.name: calendarMoments_t1

Input.description: List containing the dates of the wheat developmental phases
Input.name: calendarDates_t1

Input.description: progression on a 0 to 1 scale of the vernalization
Input.name: vernaprog_t1

Input.description: Actual number of phytomers
Input.name: leafNumber_t1

Input.description: day length
Input.name: dayLength

Input.description: Thermal time increase of the day
Input.name: deltaTT

Input.description: cumul thermal times at currentdate
Input.name: cumulTT

Input.description: current date
Input.name: currentdate

Input.description: Minimum temperature for vernalization to occur
Input.name: minTvern

Input.description: Intermediate temperature for vernalization to occur
Input.name: intTvern

Input.description: Response of vernalization rate to temperature
Input.name: vAI

Input.description: Vernalization rate at 0°C
Input.name: vBEE

Input.description: Threshold daylength below which it does influence vernalization rate
Input.name: minDL

Input.description: Saturating photoperiod above which final leaf number is not influenced by daylength
Input.name: maxDL

Input.description: Maximum temperature for vernalization to occur
Input.name: maxTvern

Input.description: Number of primorida in the apex at emergence
Input.name: pNini

Input.description: Absolute maximum leaf number
Input.name: aMXLFNO

Input.description: true if the plant is vernalizable
Input.name: isVernalizable

Output.description: progression on a 0 to 1 scale of the vernalization
Output.name: vernaprog

Output.description: List containing appearance of each stage
Output.name: calendarMoments

Output.description: List containing the dates of the wheat developmental phases
Output.name: calendarDates

Output.description: list containing for each stage occured its cumulated thermal times
Output.name: calendarCumuls
